title: ~*Sleepover Zoe!*~ (Skin Concept by Iruse)
body:
This is a Slumber Party/Sleepover Zoe skin concept made for the Riot Art Contest that i saw on Polycount by an artist named Iruse IT'S SUPER FREAKING CUTE AND I LOVE THE BRAIDS ;W; so i wanted to share it with people on here :3 the artist did a really good job! It looks Legit ;A; i also thought i'd add some ability ideas as well >_< so ye :p https://imgur.com/a/R8ygg

Passive- White sparkles with ZzZzZzZzZ's in it :3 

Q- A sparkles Pillow or Stuffed Animal (maybe like the one in the picture :p) that explodes with ZzZzZ's and Sparkles~ and maybe feathers or cotton lol

W-Drops a pillow or stuffed animal or something kek, the balloon can have a Z on it or can be a poro balloon or something xD the 3 missiles after casting a spell can be feathers like from inside a pillow, or little glowing stars that u stick on the ceiling xD It can be Z's LOL 

E- This can be a big puffy pillow that plops on the floor lingering with white sparkles, feathers and zZzZzZ's kekekek lol it could be a sand bubble (to reference the sandman that makes people fall asleep LOL idk i'm dumb ;w;) it can also just be a white bubble with the z's n stuff lol the tune can probably stay the same unless someone has another idea lol

R- her ulti can be her diving into a Pillow Portal XD or a tiny round blanket fort opening with pillows inside LOL idk i can imagine it but it's hard to describe LOL it can be a few different thing tbh lol maybe even something silly like a toybox opening with toys and stuffed animals in it kek

Ye that's what i thought the abilities could be xD i hope you guys love this idea the person obviously did an AMAZING job on the concept and it's SUPER cute and i'd LOVE to see it become real ;w; it's adorable ALSO I FREAKING LOVE TWIN BRAIDS AND THEY LOOK SO FKING CUTE ON ZOE AHHHHHHH NEEEDDD Rito Keep Zoe with Twin Braids in mind xD that needs to happen LOL thank you :3
http://polycount.com/discussion/comment/2615821#Comment_2615821

replies.body: cute

I hate that cancer Zoe, but this skin is sooo cuuuteee! 
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

what about sleepover aurelion sol 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
or sleepover Taliyah (cries in korean) ;W;
I know right
Wait until everyone starts calling her a loli. That's when everything going to go down.
Isn't she already one..?
She is a Loli xD she resembles a young girl so that makes her one~ she also sounds and acts like one kek

> [{quoted}](name=Elinz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FQ8U5IAH,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2018-02-17T22:08:25.377+0000)
>
> She is a Loli xD she resembles a young girl so that makes her one~ she also sounds and acts like one kek

Courtesy of google: 
"ロリ" ("loli") is a Japanese slang word that means "little girl" and refers to any female, typically adolescent, with a childlike or youthful appearance. The word is contracted from "ロリータ" ("lolita"), which originated from the novel entitled Lolita by Vladimir Nabokov. Lolis are central to lolicon subculture.

lolicon definition by google:
The sexual attraction to young girls. n. An individual fixated on young, generally prepubescent, girls. n. Erotic or suggestive art depicting prepubescent females.

You seem to be quite familiar with this "loli" bullshit. 
It seems to me like these definitions are pretty much describing what these images are...
I rest my case! 
People like you should go to jail! 
This is a sick subculture and is in no way a laughing matter!

A loli is a term for Anime used to describe a person who IS OR RESEMBLES A LITTLE GIRL it is a fucking character type, why are you reaching so hard to call people %%%%philes who AREN'T ??? i think you need to leave, and ONCE AGAIN replying for the other comment, SHE IS WEARING SHORTS THOSE AREN'T PANTIES AND NOBODY SHOULD BE THINKING OF IT IN SUCH A NASTY WAY LIKE YOU'RE ASSUMING JUST STOP. -.-
Nice troll.

I'd rather have her wearing some onesie, just like Meowkai or Gnar. 
https://i.imgur.com/RXyI5I0.jpg

Oh wow, that's awesome! I've had this slumber party skin line idea for awhile based around the idea that Lux invites Annie, Lulu, and Ezreal to a sleepover, but her parents won't let Ezreal stay without a chaperone so Garen is there, too, and Garen doesn't want to be the only adult so he somehow convinces Darius to come and Darius very confused about what's happening. This skin concept could so kick off an idea that I've thought would be awesome for so long, please make it happen ;-;
Lux and Taliyah are friends ;W; Make her there too!!! XD Imagine her chucking pillows and making a blanket fort for her ulti LOL ;A;

>
> Lux and Taliyah are friends ;W; Make her there too!!! XD Imagine her chucking pillows and making a blanket fort for her ulti LOL ;A;

I had the idea before Taliyah was released >.> But yes, Taliyah throwing pillows instead of rocks would be amazing XD

I've had this slumber party skin line idea for awhile based around the idea that Lux invites Annie, Lulu, and Ezreal to a sleepover, but her parents won't let Ezreal stay without a chaperone so Garen is there, too, and Garen doesn't want to be the only adult so he somehow convinces Darius to come and Darius very confused about what's happening. This skin concept could so kick off an idea that I've thought would be awesome for so long, please make it happen ;-;

Annie would start a fire in the house
This fits so well with her kit. Like when she dives she dives into a dream land. Her sleep is well...sleep. OH OH instead of her shooting a cosmic shot can she throw pillows?!
a good name for a PJ skin line woukd be Pajama Party. to go with Pool Party.
YES ! I really wanted pajamas on champs and is is so cute !
as much as I hate zoe, if this becomes a skin, she'll have two god-tier skins that push the boundaries of how cute something can be.
Hnnnggg...DANGER DANGER Cuteness Overload detected
I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS CONCEPT !!! GJ {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
This is so adorable!! I love this, especially the Poro slippers :D
This is really cute, I like the poro slippers. Really suits Zoe, too.
Awwwwwww! <3
I think her shorts should be a bit longer, they seem super short for a ~child
well they're just shorts you shouldn't really be thinking of it in that way xDD
well im gay so i'm not thinking of it in *that* way but if those ~~underwear~~ shorts got much tighter youd be able to see her 1000 year old child vag

I don't know. This seems out of place in this game and on the disturbingly %%%%philia side. This seems weird and disturbing. Having child characters already odd, but this is pushing the envelope of what should be in this game. I mean this character design seems a bit off to begin with...nah this really doesn't feel right to me.
dude, you'd be the "sick freak" to think of a child wearing shorts as sexual. don't be gross yo...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
What the actual fuck is wrong with you? like seriously, are you okay dude?
lmfao, the name

What is wrong with some of the people commenting on here?? This is supposed to be an innocent, cute skin concept for Zoe yet some people are making it look like it's "sexual". Yes, she has shorts on. So what? Kids wear shorts in real life. Calm down and stop trying to make this adorable skin look like something bad.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=bellilikejelli,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FQ8U5IAH,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2018-04-19T00:58:14.691+0000)
>
> What is wrong with some of the people commenting on here?? This is supposed to be an innocent, cute skin concept for Zoe yet some people are making it look like it's "sexual". Yes, she has shorts on. So what? Kids wear shorts in real life. Calm down and stop trying to make this adorable skin look like something bad.
> {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

IKR!

OMG, I love you! 
!3
Thank you for doing and sharing with all of us, I also freakin LOVE BRAIDS, be it single of twins, they are really really realllly cute! 
Im really happy I found a person whom to shares this love for such a lovely hairstyle
IKRRR ;W; It's my favorite hairstyleee!

Why is this not taken down?
This is literally a little **UNDERAGE** girl in her underwear you sick fucks.
Why is her bottom half, just her in underwear???
I have already reported this post for being offensive i hope you do the same... 
This is sick.

You almost sound serious...

Just one flaw though: She is thousands of years old.
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Zoe/Background

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FQ8U5IAH,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2018-02-17T15:29:54.148+0000)
>
> You almost sound serious...

What are you even talking about?
I'm as open minded as can be but i'm not going to pretend to be okay with drawings of an **UNDERAGE** girl in her **UNDERWEAR** wtf?

>Just one flaw though: She is thousands of years old.

I guess that makes it ok? 
She is a fictional character, age doesn't matter when it comes to fictional characters because how they look is the bottom line. 
Example: you could draw a toddler and call it a million years old **IT'S STILL A FUCKING TODDLER** you just say it's a million years old

You can say that she can be as old as the dinosaurs that doesn't change the fact that she looks the way she looks.

>She is a fictional character

And as long as it's fictional, I really don't care.

And I would advice you to watch your tone.

I am only appreciating the image as a piece of fan made art for a bunch of pixels in this here video game. 

YOU are the one who - for some reason - are thinking of it in a sexual way.
And you are also taking verbal potshots at anyone whom you decide also thinks of it that way.

Be consistent, please.

>I'm as open minded as can be

Let me know when the shooting have stopped then, and we can actually have a discussion...

Until that time, this is harrassment.

yes very true, this person is seriously trying so hard to be a complete rude azz to people he/she knows nothing about  and like i ALSO said, yes they are the only person thinking of shorts on a young looking girl character as sexual sooo? who's the real "Sick Pervert" here?
screw zoe just give me those adorable slippers.

My only complaint about this is her hair doesn't have any cosmic effect going on in it. Even in her cyber pop skin it still digitalized and defys gravity. 

The poro slippers are extra adorable though!

it has pink cosmic streaks~ which is a cute addition since it'd be a bit awkward to have the girl running around with a full cosmic half of her hair xD i think the braids with streaks are a super cute idea :3 reminds me of Anna from frozen :P
This is so cute! Ik she is new but Riot please make this happen! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
Nice job!
